turkish_example_sentence: Biz pazar günü büyük sarı çiçekleri bahçeden alacağız.
english_example_sentence: We will take the large yellow flowers from the garden on Sunday.
russian_example_sentence: Мы возьмем большие желтые цветы из сада в воскресенье.
